resources.string: You want to purchase 3-cent stamps. You are at the post office and waiting in line for your turn. How many 3-cent stamps you will get in a dozen?
Two men play 7 games of checkers. Each wins an equal number of games and yet, there are no ties. How is this possible?
All the matches they played were tie.
They were not playing with each other
All of the above are possible.
You have a cup placed on a table. You are pointing towards the North and the cup is facing towards the South. On which side is the handle of the cup?
Larry father has five sons named Ten, Twenty, Thirty, Forty...Guess what would be the name of the fifth?
What goes up and down, but still remains in the same place?
The day before yesterday, Chris was 7 years old. Next year, she will turn 10. What is his birth date?
